dict.acceptation: 响亮的，大声的，高声的；响亮的，洪亮的，高亢的；高声的，激烈的；刺眼的，太招摇的；

sent.orig: Well, she certainly does not like loud jazz. And that concert will definitely be loud.
sent.trans: 嗯，她肯定不喜欢喧闹的爵士乐。而这个音乐会肯定是喧闹的。

sent.orig: The saleman spoke in loud voice to the woman customer, who was dressed in loud clothes.
sent.trans: 售货员高声地向衣着刺目的女顾客谈话。

sent.orig: We heard a loud whack, then a loud dog cry, and all was still.
sent.trans: 我们听见声音很大的“啪”的一声，然后是一声狗的大叫声，继而一切都静下来了。

sent.orig: He gave his nose a loud blow.
Said with a loud voice, Stand upright on thy feet. And he leaped and walked.
sent.trans: 就大声说、你起来、两脚站直。那人就跳起来而且行走。
